en.title: TuChaza
en.description: TuChaza is a web page specifically designed to facilitate the creation of small stores, known as 'chazas', at the National University of Colombia. The main objective of this platform is to connect the information of these stores within the university campus.

en.title: Mis notas
en.description: Mis Notas is a website designed to offer you a simple and practical way to keep track of your homework. With this tool, you can quickly record your pending tasks, assign deadlines to them, and mark them as completed once you've finished them. With Mis Notas, you can keep an organized track of your homework and make sure you don't forget any important tasks. Simplify your academic life with Mis Notas and efficiently manage your tasks.

en.title: Portafolio
en.description: My Portafolio is a website that shows my projects, knowledge and work approach. It incorporates features such as changing the theme (dark and light) and changing the language (Spanish and English) to personalize the user experience. The navigation bar allows quick access to different sections, such as projects, skills and education. In addition, it has a contact form to establish direct communication. My portfolio provides a pleasant and functional experience, making it easy to navigate, personalize and contact me. Browse my work and contact me for more information!

en.title: Bank Saint Patrick
en.description: Saint Patrick Bank is a website that aims to provide bank customers with a secure and convenient online platform to access a number of essential financial services. This platform will allow users to make transfers, check their transaction history and check their card balance quickly and efficiently.
